description: Initiates the process of retrieving an existing preview that shows the effects that running a specified Automation runbook would have on the targeted resources.

parameters.name: ExecutionPreviewId
parameters.description: The ID of the existing execution preview.

nested_items.name: ExecutionPreviewId
nested_items.description: The generated ID for the existing execution preview.

nested_items.name: EndedAt
nested_items.description: A UTC timestamp indicating when the execution preview operation ended.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the execution preview operation.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Supplemental information about the current status of the execution preview.

nested_items.name: ExecutionPreview
nested_items.description: Information about the changes that would be made if an execution were run.

nested_items.name: Automation
nested_items.description: Information about the changes that would be made if an Automation workflow were run.

nested_items.name: StepPreviews
nested_items.description: Information about the type of impact a runbook step would have on a resource.
Mutating: The runbook step would make changes to the targets through actions that create, modify, or delete resources.
Non_Mutating: The runbook step would retrieve data about resources but not make changes to them. This category generally includes Describe*, List*, Get*, and similar read-only API actions.

Undetermined: An undetermined step invokes executions performed by another orchestration service like Lambda, Step Functions, or Amazon Web Services Systems Manager Run Command. An undetermined step might also call a third-party API. Systems Manager Automation doesn't know the outcome of the orchestration processes or third-party API executions, so the results of the steps are undetermined.

nested_items.name: Regions
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon Web Services Regions targeted by the execution preview.

nested_items.name: TargetPreviews
nested_items.description: Information that provides a preview of what the impact of running the specified Automation runbook would be.

nested_items.name: Count
nested_items.description: The number of resources of a certain type included in an execution preview.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: A type of resource that was included in the execution preview.

nested_items.name: TotalAccounts
nested_items.description: Information about the Amazon Web Services accounts that were included in the execution preview.
